tool_description: This specific amazon web scraper will allow you to get detailed information on product data in JSON format.
title: Luka2220 Amazon Data Scraper

api_list.name: Get Product Search Results
api_list.description: This endpoint to retrieve all of the search result products from the specified product name from amazon in JSON format.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://luka2220-amazon-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/search/{searchquery}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "luka2220-amazon-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Product Offers
api_list.description: This endpoint will retrieve all of the available offers for the product from amazon in JSON format.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://luka2220-amazon-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/products/{productid}/offers"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "luka2220-amazon-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Product Details
api_list.description: This endpoint will get all of the details of the product that is passed.
